markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orichalcum Weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2859)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=683" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 240 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by weapon

**Bulk**  varies by weapon
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2919)

</column>

---

Orichalcum weapons can have four magic property runes instead of three. Due to orichalcum's temporal properties, etching the [quickstrike](/Equipment.aspx?ID=304) weapon property rune onto an orichalcum weapon costs half the normal Price (though transferring the rune to a weapon made of another material requires you to first pay the remaining Price and then pay the cost to transfer).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Orichalcum Weapon (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 240 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 599 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 22,500 gp (+2250 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** at least 11,250 gp of orichalcum + 1,125 gp per Bulk
name: Orichalcum Weapon
